section.heading: City of Peekskill industrial development agency

content.p:
* § 919-a. City of Peekskill industrial development agency. For the
benefit of the city of Peekskill and the inhabitants thereof, an
industrial development agency, to be known as the CITY OF PEEKSKILL
INDUSTRIAL DEVELOPMENT AGENCY, is hereby established for the
accomplishment of any or all of the purposes specified in title one of
article eighteen-A of this chapter. It shall constitute a body corporate
and politic, and be perpetual in duration. It shall have the powers and
duties now or hereafter conferred by title one of article eighteen-A of
this chapter upon industrial development agencies. It shall organize in
a manner prescribed by and be subject to the provisions of title one of
article eighteen-A of this chapter. Its members shall be appointed by
the governing body of the city of Peekskill. The agency, its members,
officers and employees, and its operations and activities shall in all
respects be governed by the provisions of title one of article
eighteen-A of this chapter.
 * NB Agency expires per §§ 856 and 882
